header.title: RegulaEase
header.subtitle: Small Business Support Assistant
header.description: Navigate compliance, develop skills, and access AI-powered business guidance - all designed for South African entrepreneurs.

hero.description: Navigate South African business regulations with confidence. Get personalized compliance checklists, skills development resources, and AI-powered guidance - all in your preferred language.

about.title: Empowering South African Entrepreneurs
about.subtitle: We believe every business deserves to thrive. Our platform provides the tools, knowledge, and support needed to navigate complex regulations and build successful enterprises.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To democratize business success by making regulatory compliance accessible, understandable, and actionable for every South African entrepreneur.

points.empowerment: Empower entrepreneurs with knowledge and tools

vision.title: Building Tomorrow's Economy
vision.description: Creating a thriving ecosystem where every business can succeed.

projects.title: Comprehensive Business Solutions
projects.subtitle: Everything you need to start, grow, and maintain a compliant business in South Africa.

cta.title: Ready to Get Started?
cta.description: Get personalized business guidance from our AI assistant
cta.action: Click the chat icon below to begin!
cta.arrow: Your AI Assistant is waiting below

checklist.title: Business Compliance Checklist
checklist.description: Get your customized compliance requirements based on your business type.

results.title: Compliance Steps for {{businessType}}
results.noResults: No tasks match your current filters.

checklist.empty: Select a business type and click "Get Checklist" to see compliance requirements.

skills.title: Skills Development Resources
skills.description: Access learning resources to develop essential business skills.
skills.searchPlaceholder: Search by title, description, or provider...

results.title: Learning Resources for {{category}}
results.noResults: No resources match your current filters.

skills.empty: Select a skills category and click "Get Resources" to see learning opportunities.

chatbot.title: AI Business Assistant
chatbot.description: Get instant answers to your business questions from our AI-powered assistant.
chatbot.placeholder: Ask about business registration, compliance, taxes, licenses...
chatbot.confirmClear: Are you sure you want to reset the chat? This will clear all conversation history.
chatbot.inputHint: Press Enter to send, Shift+Enter for new line

samples.registration: What are the basic requirements to start a retail business in South Africa?
samples.cipc: How do I register my business with CIPC?
samples.tax: What tax obligations do small businesses have?
samples.bank: Do I need a business bank account?
samples.licenses: What licenses do I need for a restaurant?

errors.aiError: Failed to get response from AI assistant
errors.connectionError: Unable to connect to the server. Make sure the Flask backend is running.

settings.helpText: These settings help customize AI responses to your specific needs and communication style.

errors.networkError: Unable to connect to the server. Make sure the Flask backend is running.
errors.fetchError: Failed to fetch data. Please try again.
errors.serverError: Server error occurred. Please try again later.
errors.notFound: The requested resource was not found.
